Address: 1048 INDUSTRIAL COURT, SUWANEE, Georgia, 30024, United States of America
CompanyDescription: Upon Digirad's acquisition of ATRM Holdings, Inc. ("ATRM") on September 10, 2019 (the "ATRM Merger" or the "ATRM Acquisition"), Digirad converted into a diversified holding company (the "HoldCo Conversion"). As a diversified holding company, Digirad has three divisions: * Healthcare (Digirad Health): designs, manufactures, and distributes diagnostic medical imaging products. Digirad Health operates in three businesses: Diagnostic Services, Mobile Healthcare, and Diagnostic Imaging. The Diagnostic Services business offers imaging and monitoring services to healthcare providers as an alternative to purchasing the equipment or outsourcing the job to another physician or imaging center.  ...
